verses.name: Colossians 1:25
verses.text: Whereof I am made a minister, according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you, to fulfil the word of God;

verses.name: Colossians 1:26
verses.text: Even the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations, but now is made manifest to his saints:

verses.name: Colossians 1:27
verses.text: To whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles; which is Christ in you, the hope of glory:

verses.name: Colossians 1:28
verses.text: Whom we preach, warning every man, and teaching every man in all wisdom; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus:
